com.azure.android.communication.ui.configuration

Class LocalizationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.android.communication.ui.configuration.LocalizationConfiguration

  • public final class LocalizationConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Localization configuration to provide for CallComposite. 
    
 // Initialize the call composite builder with different parameters
 final CallCompositeBuilder builder = new CallCompositeBuilder()
     .localization(new LocalizationConfiguration(LanguageCode.FRENCH));

 final CallCompositeBuilder builder = new CallCompositeBuilder()
     .localization(new LocalizationConfiguration(LanguageCode.FRENCH, layoutDirection));

 // Build the call composite
 CallComposite callComposite = builder.build();
    See Also:
    CallComposite
